links.title: Economic Calendar
links.description: The median forecasts that MarketWatch publishes each week in the economic calendar come from the forecasts of the 15 economists who have scored the highest in our contest over the past 12 months, as well as the forecasts of the most recent winner of the Forecaster of the Month contest.

messages.body: Phone maker Xiaomi shares slip in trading debut in Hong Kong $AAPL #AAPL https://www.marketbeat.com/n/3935575/

links.title: Phone maker Xiaomi shares slip in trading debut in Hong Kong
links.description: Xiaomi's Founder, Chairman and CEO Lei Jun receives an interview after the listing ceremony at the Hong Kong Stock Exchange in Hong Kong Monday, July 9, 2018. (AP Photo/Vincent Yu) HONG KONG (AP) - Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp. shares have slipped in its first trading day in Hong Kong following a multibillion-dollar initial public offering.

$AAPL How to Trade Apple Inc After an Earnings Rip  http://bit.ly/___AAPL__ 
- 
Know when to really dig your heels in on a trade.

links.title: $AAPL The Bullish Option Trade After an Earnings Rip in Apple Inc
links.description: If you've ever seen a stop rip off of earnings and wondered if that was a signal for a trade, or if the momentum would continue, then this is exactly the back-test you are after. We call it "star gazing" when a stock rips and we're stuck -- with no idea what to expect next.
